00042 #include <QPainter>
00043 #include <QTextBlock>

00045 #include "CodeEditArea.h"

00047 CodeEditArea::CodeEditArea( QWidget* parent )
00048 :QPlainTextEdit( parent )
00049 {
00050         connect(this, SIGNAL( cursorPositionChanged() ), this, SLOT( UpdateCurrentLine() ) );
00051         /*connect(this, SIGNAL( blockCountChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( UpdateCodeEditAreaWidth( int ) ) );
00052         connect(this, SIGNAL( updateRequest( QRect, int ) ), m_LineNumberWidget, SLOT( UpdateLineNumberArea( QRect, int ) ) );
00053 
00054 */
00055         //UpdateCodeEditAreaWidth(0);
00056         UpdateCurrentLine();
00057 }

00060 CodeEditArea::~CodeEditArea()
00061 {
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 int CodeEditArea::BlockTop( const QTextBlock & block ) const
00066 {
00067         return (int) blockBoundingGeometry(block).translated(contentOffset()).top();
00068 }
00069 
00070 int CodeEditArea::BlockHeight( const QTextBlock & block ) const
00071 {
00072         return (int) blockBoundingRect(block).height();
00073 }
00074 
00075  void CodeEditArea::UpdateCurrentLine()
00076 {
00077         QList<QTextEdit::ExtraSelection> extraSelections;
00078 
00079         if( !isReadOnly() )
00080         {
00081                 QTextEdit::ExtraSelection selection;
00082 
00083                 QColor lineColor = QColor(Qt::yellow).lighter(160);
00084 
00085                 selection.format.setBackground(lineColor);
00086                 selection.format.setProperty(QTextFormat::FullWidthSelection, true);
00087                 selection.cursor = textCursor();
00088                 selection.cursor.clearSelection();
00089                 extraSelections.append(selection);
00090         }
00091 
00092         setExtraSelections(extraSelections);
00093 }
